title: [EUW]-[Diamond 3+]-[LF Toplane]-[Ranked 5v5 , Tournaments]
body:
Our Team is looking for a Diamond 3+ Toplane to join us on the rift. Jungle: Dia 2 , Mid: Dia1-Master , AD Carry Dia1 , Sup: Dia 3.

We are all german so it would be nice if you are german aswell or able to talk it because it would make the communication a lot easier.
Our goal is to climb the teamranked ladder to at least diamond and play in small and bigger tournaments. We try to train 2-3 times a week and mainly communicate via whatsapp , client or facebook.

If you are interested just comment your ign. I will contact you asap or add me on League (ign. WiraRasca) 
Thanks for reading and good luck on the rift!

replies.body: Hi, bin momentan Plat2+ (gedroppt wegen inaktivität) Spiele seit Season 2 in Dia. Würde mich gerne bewerben, bin nächste Woche mind. Dia4~
